channel.title: Hi i need help with puttin my ip address in the client
channel.description: OK i just need some1 to help me to get my ip in my client so that players can logg on when i get i get done with the server so if any1 can help me plz send me a message or add me on msn my name on there is kyle.brewer@live.com.

item.title: Hi i need help with puttin my ip address in the client
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

kyle90:

ok i think i got yhe main concept but when i go to compile after i change my ip it keeps sayin the system cannot find the path specified u know anythin that i can do to fix that?

Do you have JDK update 6 version 20 installed in your Program Files>Java> ?.

And your compile.bat file should have something like this -

@echo off COLOR 04 title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

If you have JDK 6_20 installed.

&& I know a Kyle Brewer that lives in Morgan-City. :o

Read full topic
item.source: Hi i need help with puttin my ip address in the client

item.title: Hi i need help with puttin my ip address in the client
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

kyle90:

ok but every time i try to compile it says i dont have jdk 5.0or 6.0 and i just downloaded the update 20 verson of it and it still wont work

Off topic, but would you happen to live in Morgan-City? :oo.

EDIT: And all you need to do is open up your compile.bat, and replace the version that is already on it, to 6.0_20.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi i need help with puttin my ip address in the client
item.dc:creator: @spudnut spudnut
item.description:
@spudnut wrote:

make sure if your friend tries on another computer that it is set to your global ip not the local ip of 127.0.0.1 or localhost hope this helps

item.title: Hi i need help with puttin my ip address in the client

item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

the EGUI (or GUI if yu dont have EGUI) is/are the file(s) for yu

it should say local host or 127.0.0.1 if it wasn’t preset to the ip, if it was then it would be something else
